name: A Half World
description: I was looking at a photo album that I had taken of the city of turquoise domes in Iran,"Isfahan". As always, my mind traveled to the future and saw that only a few pieces of the city's historical monuments remained. The day when that delicate soul and the turquoise motifs with the wind gave their hearts to the sea and they have a long journey on their way. "Chahar Bagh School" in Isfahan was the source of inspiration for me to start designing the modern texture of this thousand-colored city.
